rules.description: Left Command tap to Tab, hold to Command Alt on Built-in Keyboard
Right Command to backspace when tapped, Left Alt when held (Built-in keyboard only)
Option + Semicolon to Semicolon (Built-in Keyboard only)
Hold Slash to Shift (Built-in keyboard only)
Change Single Quote to Left Control (Built-in keyboard only)
Semicolon to Enter (Hold to Left Control) on Built-in Keyboard, Shift + Semicolon to Shift + Enter
Spacebar to Alt when held, Space when tapped (Built-in keyboard only)
Double tap '/' to '-' on Built-in Keyboard
Double tap '.' to ':' on Built-in Keyboard
Double tap ',' to ';' on Built-in Keyboard
Double tap 'option+{' to '[', single tap to '{'
Double tap 'option+}' to ']', single tap to '}'
Double tap 'option+d' to '>', single tap to ')'
Double tap 'option+s' to '<', single tap to '('
Change option + q to !, option + w to @, option + e to #, option + r to $, option + t to %, option + y to &, option + u to *
Option + O to ` and Option + Shift + O to ~
Change option + s to ( and option + d to )
Change option + shift + s to { and option + shift + d to }
Map Left Option plus h/j/k/l to Arrows
option + - to semicolon and option + shift + - to colon
Convert / to - when IME is ON
Convert Ctrl + Enter to Ctrl + Semicolon when IME is ON
Change option + x to { and option + c to }
option + v to quote and optio + shift + v to `
option + b to doublequote and option + shift + b to ~
option + n to | and option + shift + n to \
Control+Option+Enter(Alfred): Turn off IME and send the key
Change option + . to ] and option + > to }
Change option + , to [ and option + [ to { and option + , to <
Mac OSX: left cmd + double-tap q  close application
